mapper.insert: insert into VIDEO_COMMENT (VIDEO_ID, USER_ID, PID, COMMENTARY, DEPTH) values (#{video_id} ,#{user_id}, #{pid}, #{commentary}, #{depth})
mapper.select: select vc.COMMENT_ID, vc.PID, vc.COMMENTARY, vc.VIDEO_ID, vc.DEPTH, vc.DEPTH_LEV, vc.CREATE_DATE, u.NICKNAME, u.IMG from VIDEO_COMMENT vc join USER u on vc.USER_ID = u.USER_ID where vc.VIDEO_ID=#{video_id} and DEPTH=0 order by vc.CREATE_DATE desc
